channel.title: Client ip changing
channel.description: okay so i downloaded a client, but it doesnt have an ip section. So what do i do,i want people to download this client, and when they log in, it goes to my ip help me please :|

item.title: Client ip changing
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

as i just said in another topic…

I’m not sure, but maybe this?

public final void init() { try { anInt957 = 0; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("orb-pkz.no-ip.org", "43594"); method2(503, false, 765); } catch (Exception exception) { return; } }

the “set server” is “IP” “PORT”…

This is in Client.java in the client folder.

Hope it helps :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2009, 02:51:03 am[/size][hr]For example, I would change it too

public final void init() { try { anInt957 = 0; anInt958 = 0; method52(true); aBoolean959 = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); setserver("YOUR IP HERE", "YOUR PORT HERE"); method2(503, false, 765); } catch (Exception exception) { return; } }

Read full topic
